title: Sunny, spacious 3BR/1BA Flat in the Mission District!
posting_body: Sunny, spacious 3BR/1BA Flat in the Mission District!
Come live in the sunny Mission District!
Located in a quiet corner of the neighborhood, the location is a short walk to the Mission District’s best restaurants, nightlife, and parks.
This newly-renovated flat has three bedrooms, one bath, and original details like stained glass windows and hardwood floors.
Convenient transportation options are nearby, and the weather is the best San Francisco has to offer.
• Brand new kitchen appliances, flooring, tile, and countertops
• Period details like hardwood floors, stained glass windows
• The best of the Mission District!
Close to restaurants, entertainment, and parks.
Schedule Appointment through 'Contact Us' on the Property Page:
Showing Guidelines Will Be Sent After a Completed Guest Card
•Applicant(s) Must Physically View the Unit Prior to Submitting Application(s)
•FaceTime, Skype, Zoom, or Any Other Virtual Viewing Platform/Resource Is Not Accepted as a Replacement of Physical Viewings
Applicant(s) Must Attend Viewing Together Prior to Submitting Individual Applications
Applications Will Be Reviewed Once All Intended Residents Have Attended Viewing Together & Submitted An Application
•Marketing of This Unit Will Continue Until We’ve Received Move-in Funds From an Executed Lease
•Security Deposit Equivalent to One Month Rent
